front.title: Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) Authorization for Network Access Server (NAS) Management

abstract.t: This document describes Remote Authentication Dial-In User Service (RADIUS) attributes for the authorization and service provisioning of local and remote management of embedded systems and other managed entities, generally referred to as Network Access Servers (NASes). Specific provisions are made for remote management via framed management protocols, and for more granular levels of access rights and management privileges.
